event.title: was mentioned in the Pipe Roll of 1183

It is thought that the colliery was operating by 1820, and its tramway is shown on a parliamentary plan from 1830 and an 1845 map.

event.title: is shown on a parliamentary plan from 1830

data.event: It is thought that the colliery was operating by 1820, and its tramway is shown on a parliamentary plan from 1830 and an 1845 map.

event.title: 18 June 1885, an underground explosion at the colliery killed

data.event: On 18 June 1885, an underground explosion at the colliery killed 178 men and boys.
